summary: Lydia of Whiterun becomes Lydia the North Girl.
descriptionHtml:
[size=4]Lydia the North Girl[/size]

OK, so this is my first ever uploaded mod, it's a visual overhaul of Lydia, changing her face, skin, outfit and hair.
All credit to original authors:

Northgirl Armor by anka01 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38053]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38053[/url]
Coverwomen by mrLenski - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3563]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3563[/url]
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168[/url]
DIMONIZED UNP female body by dimon99 - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709]http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709[/url]

I've been using her for a while in my own game, and I think she looks really good, so I decided to upload her.

Just unzip and copy all files to your Skyrim\Data directory.

This mod is stand alone and does not require the mods listed above, however I do recommend them as they are amazing.

This mod shouldn't conflict with other mods unless they change the appearance of Lydia.

**Bugs**
I've removed all reference that I can find to her original outfit, however, when you get her to follow you upon switching location via a load screen she wears her original gloves and boots - I can't seem to get her to just use the ones I've given her. If anyone figures it out please feel free to upload a fixed ESM file.

Hope you guys like it.
author: the_mooseknuckle
